lead_paragraph: The Mavericks have informed representatives of Golden State's Harrison Barnes that they intend to sign the restricted free agent to an offer sheet for a four-year, $95 million contract, two people with knowledge of Dallas' plans said Saturday.

headline.print_headline: AP Sources: Mavs Plan Max Offer Sheet for Warriors' Barnes
headline.main: AP Sources: Mavs Plan Max Offer Sheet for Warriors' Barnes

snippet: The Mavericks have informed representatives of Golden State's Harrison Barnes that they intend to sign the restricted free agent to an offer sheet for a four-year, $95 million contract, two people with knowledge of Dallas' plans said Saturday....
